subscription.qT1: We created PulseSync based on our own vision and desire to build something we would want to use every day. We are not aiming to turn this project into a business; instead, we focus on creating the best experience for you. PulseSync remains open, ad-free, and free from anything that could detract from your experience.
subscription.qT2: Supporting PulseSync is not just about helping the project but expressing trust in our vision and efforts. It wonâ€™t give you any special benefits but will make you part of our friendly team and maybe a bit cooler in your friends' eyes! :) Your contributions help us cover server costs and continue developing PulseSync. We sincerely thank each of you for your support. Together, weâ€™re creating something special!

auth.no_beta: To gain access, you need a subscription to <1>Boosty</1> or to boost our Discord server <3>Discord</3>. Access to the beta will be granted afterward.

index.welcome_title: The best app for Yandex Music integration
index.welcome_description: PulseSync is a project that integrates with Yandex Music. The program also supports Yandex Music Discord RPC status, custom themes, and scripts.
index.addons_description: You have the ability to customize the look and functionality as you like. Create your own addons by adding unique visual and functional elements. If you donâ€™t want to create your own, you can download ready-made solutions from other users and developers on our Discord server.
index.stargazers_thankyou: Thank you to the stargazers on GitHub
